text:
@SecPompeo @WHO Why Fort Detrick be closed?Anything coverup?

Whereabouts of the 5 military soldiers who participated in WH sports meetings last Nov?

Why the numbers of vaping suddenly gone? 

How the US navy & submarine got infected with Coronavirus?

Why Israel and ally be informed last year?
